org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.client

Class RestfulDiffuserManagerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.client.RestfulDiffuserManagerClient

  • public class RestfulDiffuserManagerClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client that wraps the RESTful API for interacting with RESTful diffusers in a convenient Java wrapper.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestfulDiffuserManagerClient

        public RestfulDiffuserManagerClient(java.net.URI baseUri)
        Constructs a RestfulDiffuserManagerClient that connects to a RestfulDiffuserServer with an end-point at the specified base URI. The base URI is the starting point to which diffuser-specific path information is added.
        Parameters:
        baseUri - The RestfulDiffuserServer end-point to which this client connects

      • RestfulDiffuserManagerClient

        public RestfulDiffuserManagerClient(java.lang.String baseUri)
        Constructs a RestfulDiffuserManagerClient that connects to a RestfulDiffuserServer with an end-point at the specified base URI. The base URI is the starting point to which diffuser-specific path information is added.
        Parameters:
        baseUri - The RestfulDiffuserServer end-point to which this client connects

    • Method Detail

      • createDiffuser

        public CreateDiffuserResponse createDiffuser(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                    java.lang.String methodName,
                                    java.lang.Class<?>... argumentTypes)
        Requests that the server create a RESTful diffuser for a method that doesn't return any value.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class containing the diffusive method
        methodName - The name of the diffusive method
        argumentTypes - The Class for each of the formal method parameters of the diffusive method
        Returns:
        An Atom feed containing the result of the create request, and specifically, the URI of the newly created diffuser.

      • createDiffuser

        public CreateDiffuserResponse createDiffuser(java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPathUri,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                    java.lang.String methodName,
                                    java.lang.Class<?>... argumentTypes)
        Requests that the server create a RESTful diffuser for a method that doesn't return any value.
        Parameters:
        classPathUri - The list of URI which to search for remote classes
        clazz - The Class containing the diffusive method
        methodName - The name of the diffusive method
        argumentTypes - The Class for each of the formal method parameters of the diffusive method
        Returns:
        An Atom feed containing the result of the create request, and specifically, the URI of the newly created diffuser.

      • createDiffuser

        public CreateDiffuserResponse createDiffuser(java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPathUri,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> returnTypeClazz,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                    java.lang.String methodName,
                                    java.lang.Class<?>... argumentTypes)
        Requests that the server create a RESTful diffuser for a method that returns a value.
        Parameters:
        classPathUri - The list of URI which to search for remote classes
        returnTypeClazz - The Class of the return type of the diffusive method
        clazz - The Class containing the diffusive method
        methodName - The name of the diffusive method
        argumentTypes - The Class for each of the formal method parameters of the diffusive method
        Returns:
        An Atom feed containing the result of the create request, and specifically, the URI of the newly created diffuser.

      • convertClassPaths

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> convertClassPaths(java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPathUri)
        Converts a List of URI into a List of Strings that represent the URI. Effectively, iterates through the list of URI calling the URI.toString() method on each and adding that to the return list.
        Parameters:
        classPathUri - The URI representing the remote class path
        Returns:
        a List of URI represented as Strings.

      • getDiffuserList

        public ListDiffuserResponse getDiffuserList()
        Returns:
        an Atom feed containing a list of entries that hold information about the diffuser resources.

        public DeleteDiffuserResponse deleteDiffuser(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                    java.lang.String methodName,

        Deletes the diffuser with a signature that matches the specified information
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class containing the diffusive method
        methodName - The name of the diffusive method
        argumentTypes - The Class for each of the formal method parameters of the diffusive method
        Returns:

                                    java.lang.String methodName,
                                    java.lang.Class<?>... argumentTypes)

        argumentTypes - The Class for each of the formal method parameters of the diffusive method
        Returns:

      • deleteDiffuser

        public DeleteDiffuserResponse deleteDiffuser(java.lang.String signature)
        Deletes the diffuser with a signature and return type that matches the specified information
        Parameters:
        signature - a DiffuserSignature signature (which is different from a Java signature because it includes the return type) of the diffuser to delete
        Returns:
        An Atom feed containing the information about the deleted diffuser

      • executeMethod

        public ExecuteDiffuserResponse executeMethod(java.lang.Class<?> returnTypeClazz,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                    java.lang.String methodName,
                                    byte[] serializedObject,
                                    Serializer serializer)
        Executes the specified method
        Parameters:
        returnType - The Class of the return type of the diffusive method
        clazz - The Class containing the diffusive method
        methodName - The name of the diffusive method
        serializedObject - A byte[] representation of the object of the Class that contains the diffusive method being called
        serializer - The Serializer used to serialize and deserialize the object
        Returns:
        An ExecuteDiffuserResponse object containing the information about the result and the underlying Atom feed.

      • executeMethod

        private ExecuteDiffuserResponse executeMethod(java.lang.String signature,
                                    byte[] serializedObject,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> serializedObjectType,
                                    java.lang.String serializerType)
        Executes the specified method
        Parameters:
        signature - a DiffuserSignature signature (which is different from a Java signature because it includes the return type) of the diffuser to use to execute the method
        serializedObject - A byte[] representation of the object of the Class that contains the diffusive method being called
        serializedObjectType - The Class of the serialized object that contains the diffusive method
        serializerType - The name of the Serializer used to serialize and deserialize the object
        Returns:
        An ExecuteDiffuserResponse object containing the information about the result and the underlying Atom feed.

      • executeMethod

        public ExecuteDiffuserResponse executeMethod(java.lang.Class<?> returnTypeClazz,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                    java.lang.String methodName,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> argumentTypes,
                                    java.util.List<byte[]> argumentValues,
                                    byte[] serializedObject,
                                    java.lang.String serializerType)
        Executes the specified method
        Parameters:
        returnType - The Class of the return type of the diffusive method
        clazz - The Class containing the diffusive method
        methodName - The name of the diffusive method
        argumentTypes - The Class for each of the formal method parameters of the diffusive method
        argumentValues - The serialized value of each of the arguments passed to the diffusive method
        serializedObject - A byte[] representation of the object of the Class that contains the diffusive method being called
        serializerType - The name of the Serializer used to serialize and deserialize the object
        Returns:
        An ExecuteDiffuserResponse object containing the information about the result and the underlying Atom feed.

      • executeMethod

        private ExecuteDiffuserResponse executeMethod(java.lang.String signature,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> argumentTypes,
                                    java.util.List<byte[]> argumentValues,
                                    byte[] serializedObject,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> serializedObjectType,
                                    java.lang.String serializerType)
        Executes the specified method
        Parameters:
        signature - a DiffuserSignature signature (which is different from a Java signature because it includes the return type) of the diffuser to use to execute the method
        argumentTypes - The Class for each of the formal method parameters of the diffusive method
        argumentValues - The serialized value of each of the arguments passed to the diffusive method
        serializedObject - A byte[] representation of the object of the Class that contains the diffusive method being called
        serializedObjectType - The Class of the serialized object that contains the diffusive method
        serializerType - The name of the Serializer used to serialize and deserialize the object
        Returns:
        An ExecuteDiffuserResponse object containing the information about the result and the underlying Atom feed.

      • executeMethod

        private ExecuteDiffuserResponse executeMethod(java.lang.String signature,
                                    ExecuteDiffuserRequest request)
        Executes the specified method
        Parameters:
        signature - a DiffuserSignature signature (which is different from a Java signature because it includes the return type) of the diffuser to use to execute the method
        request - The ExecuteDiffuserRequest object containing the information needed to execute a diffusive method
        Returns:
        An Atom feed that contains a URI from which to obtain the result.

      • getResult

        public <T> T getResult(java.lang.Class<T> returnTypeClazz,
              java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
              java.lang.String methodName,
              java.lang.String requestId,
              Serializer serializer)
        Requests the result of the executeMethod(...) request
        Parameters:
        returnType - The Class of the return type of the diffusive method
        clazz - The Class containing the diffusive method
        methodName - The name of the diffusive method
        requestId - The request ID generated and returned after the method was executed
        serializer - The Serializer used to serialize and deserialize the object
        Returns:
        The result object associated with the specified request ID

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete(java.lang.String resultId)
        Returns true if the task associated with the specified result code has completed; false otherwise
        Parameters:
        resultId - The ID of the result that will be generated by the associated task
        Returns:
        true if the task associated with the specified result code has completed; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the server returns a response code that is not "no content" or "ok"
